app.name: JSDoc Materialize
app.description: A JSDoc 3 template using the Materialize CSS framework.
app.keywords: jsdoc, jsdoc3, template, material, materialize, css
app.tagline: The clean, colorful style of Materialize CSS meets JSDoc 3, the JavaScript API documentation generator.

promo1.caption: Materialize CSS
promo1.text: Materialize CSS does most of the heavy lifting for you by providing default stylings that incorporate easy to use custom components.

promo2.caption: Simplifies
promo2.text: By utilizing elements and principles of Google's Material Design, Materialize CSS provides a framework that focuses on User Experience.

promo3.caption: JSDoc 3
promo3.text: JSDoc 3 is an API documentation generator for JavaScript, similar to JavaDoc or PHPDoc. You add documentation comments directly to your source code, right along side the code itself.
